channel.title: Rejected connections =\
channel.description:
Well, I'm about to release Dimmu so people can play, and I'm using Silab's client for now (MAJOR RESPECT SILAB!), but to the point..
Whenever I log in, it fully accepts my connection, I log out, it'll reject my connection, then accept it, but won't log me in. I realize this probably is easy to fix, I was told it might be a problem in my player.java or my server.java, but the guy wasn't sure. If you could post how to fix that, I'd be greatful. An example of what it looks like: [code] Game saved for player fr33b1e ClientHandler: Client fr33b1e disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected CRAFTY-NUMBERS:NUMBERS Connection accepted from CRAFTY-NUMBERS: NUMBERS.[/code]
Thanks for your help in advance!

item.title: Rejected connections =\
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Well, I’m about to release Dimmu so people can play, and I’m using Silab’s client for now (MAJOR RESPECT SILAB!), but to the point…

Whenever I log in, it fully accepts my connection, I log out, it’ll reject my connection, then accept it, but won’t log me in. I realize this probably is easy to fix, I was told it might be a problem in my player.java or my server.java, but the guy wasn’t sure. If you could post how to fix that, I’d be greatful. An example of what it looks like:

Game saved for player fr33b1e ClientHandler: Client fr33b1e disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected CRAFTY-NUMBERS:NUMBERS Connection accepted from CRAFTY-NUMBERS: NUMBERS.

Thanks for your help in advance!
